title: Unlock My Heart
description: Can you fall in love with someone over the phone? That is what Sebastian is wondering. From the first time he heard Chloe’s voice he just can’t get her out of his mind. After talking on the phone for almost six months, he is ready to meet in person and unlock the chains from her heart. Chloe on the other hand is skeptical about the whole “soul mate” business and prefers to keep things the way they are. All that changes when she meets Chris. What she doesn’t know is that Chris is hiding something that could ultimately destroy everything including her friendship with Sebastian.
author: Alina Man
